list_all_equal¶

utils.list_all_equal(data)[source]¶

Checks if all of the elements of a list are the same.

Parameters

data (list of 1D) – The list of elements to compare

Returns

equivalence – True if the elements are all the same

Return type

bool

Notes

Based on https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3844801
